title: Global Log Standard (G-Log) Telemetry Structure
description: Defines the required JSON structure for all operational and auditable telemetry emitted by the Sovereign System (G-Log Standard). This must be strictly enforced at Gate S7 (Exit) to ensure audit chain integrity.

operation_id.description: Unique ID tracing the entire execution context.

gate_stage.description: The specific operational gate where the log event occurred.

module.description: Subsystem/component responsible for the event (e.g., CAC, SDVM, ECVM).

context_data.description: Optional detailed context metrics or payload snippets.
